headline: Street Art Indoors, And Legos in a Hall
abstract: Fun-house flair mingles with equally bold but more stately pieces at David and Isabela Grutman’s home.
lead_paragraph: MIAMI BEACH — To say that the art in David and Isabela Grutman’s home bombards the senses is an understatement. Over the last 15 years, Mr. Grutman, 45, a restaurateur and club owner, has amassed a sizable collection of head-turning pieces. Many are sculptures, but paintings, street art and installations in bold colors also figure in it.
